mapper.select: SELECT OUTHD.SLS_OUT_HD_DATE, OUTHD.SLS_OUT_HD_NO, VEND.VEND_CD_NM, FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE, FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_NAME, OUTHD.SLS_ORD_HD_NO, ORDDTL.SLS_ORD_DTL_VOL, OUTDTL.SLS_OUT_DTL_PRVS_VOL, OUTDTL.SLS_OUT_DTL_VOL, OUTDTL.FNS_PRD_STK_LOT_NO, FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_PRICE, OUTDTL.SLS_OUT_DTL_PRICE, EMP.EMP_NAME, NVL(OUTHD.SLS_OUT_HD_REMK, ' ') AS SLS_OUT_HD_REMK FROM BF_SALES_OUT_HD OUTHD JOIN BF_SALES_OUT_DTL OUTDTL ON OUTHD.SLS_OUT_HD_NO = OUTDTL.SLS_OUT_HD_NO JOIN BF_SALES_ORD_HD ORDHD ON ORDHD.SLS_ORD_HD_NO = OUTHD.SLS_ORD_HD_NO JOIN BF_SALES_ORD_DTL ORDDTL ON ORDHD.SLS_ORD_HD_NO = ORDDTL.SLS_ORD_HD_NO JOIN BF_CMN_EMP EMP ON EMP.EMP_ID = OUTHD.EMP_ID JOIN BF_CMN_VENDOR_CODE VEND ON VEND.VEND_CD_CODE = OUTHD.VEND_CD_CODE JOIN BF_CMN_FINISH_PRODUCT_CODE FNSPRD ON FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE = OUTDTL.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE JOIN BF_SALES_FINISH_PRODUCT_STOK FNSPRDSK ON FNSPRDSK.FNS_PRD_STK_LOT_NO = OUTDTL.FNS_PRD_STK_LOT_NO WHERE ORDDTL.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE = OUTDTL.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE ORDER BY SLS_OUT_HD_DATE DESC, SLS_OUT_HD_NO DESC

SELECT DISTINCT ORDHD.SLS_ORD_HD_NO, ORDHD.SLS_ORD_HD_DATE, VEND.VEND_CD_CODE, VEND.VEND_CD_NM, EMP.EMP_ID, EMP.EMP_NAME, NVL(ORDHD.SLS_ORD_HD_REMK, ' ') AS SLS_ORD_HD_REMK FROM BF_SALES_ORD_HD ORDHD JOIN BF_SALES_ORD_DTL ORDDTL ON ORDDTL.SLS_ORD_HD_NO = ORDHD.SLS_ORD_HD_NO JOIN BF_CMN_VENDOR_CODE VEND ON ORDHD.VEND_CD_CODE = VEND.VEND_CD_CODE JOIN BF_CMN_EMP EMP ON ORDHD.EMP_ID = EMP.EMP_ID
WHERE ORDDTL.SLS_ORD_DTL_VOL > ORDDTL.SLS_ORD_DTL_OUT_VOL
AND TRUNC(ORDHD.SLS_ORD_HD_DATE) BETWEEN #{ordSdate} AND #{ordEdate}
ORDER BY SLS_ORD_HD_DATE DESC, SLS_ORD_HD_NO DESC

SELECT FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE, FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_NAME, FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_PRICE, ORDDTL.SLS_ORD_DTL_VOL, NVL(ORDDTL.SLS_ORD_DTL_OUT_VOL, 0) AS SLS_ORD_DTL_OUT_VOL FROM BF_SALES_ORD_DTL ORDDTL JOIN BF_CMN_FINISH_PRODUCT_CODE FNSPRD ON FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE = ORDDTL.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE WHERE SLS_ORD_HD_NO = #{slsOrdHdNo} AND ORDDTL.SLS_ORD_DTL_VOL > ORDDTL.SLS_ORD_DTL_OUT_VOL

SELECT OUTDTL.SLS_OUT_HD_NO, FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE, FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_NAME, ORDDTL.SLS_ORD_DTL_VOL, MIN(FNSPRDSK.FNS_PRD_STK_LOT_NO) AS FNS_PRD_STK_LOT_NO, MIN(OUTDTL.SLS_OUT_DTL_PRVS_VOL) AS SLS_OUT_DTL_PRVS_VOL, SUM(OUTDTL.SLS_OUT_DTL_VOL) AS SLS_OUT_DTL_VOL, FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_PRICE, COUNT(*) AS SLS_OUT_COUNT FROM BF_SALES_OUT_DTL OUTDTL JOIN BF_SALES_OUT_HD OUTHD ON OUTHD.SLS_OUT_HD_NO = OUTDTL.SLS_OUT_HD_NO JOIN BF_SALES_ORD_HD ORDHD ON ORDHD.SLS_ORD_HD_NO = OUTHD.SLS_ORD_HD_NO JOIN BF_SALES_ORD_DTL ORDDTL ON ORDDTL.SLS_ORD_HD_NO = ORDHD.SLS_ORD_HD_NO JOIN BF_CMN_FINISH_PRODUCT_CODE FNSPRD ON FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE = OUTDTL.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE JOIN BF_SALES_FINISH_PRODUCT_STOK FNSPRDSK ON FNSPRDSK.FNS_PRD_STK_LOT_NO = OUTDTL.FNS_PRD_STK_LOT_NO WHERE OUTDTL.SLS_OUT_HD_NO = #{slsOutHdNo} AND ORDDTL.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE = OUTDTL.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE GROUP BY OUTDTL.SLS_OUT_HD_NO, FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE, FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_NAME, ORDDTL.SLS_ORD_DTL_VOL, FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_PRICE
mapper.insert:
SELECT SLS_ORD_DTL_OUT_VOL FROM BF_SALES_ORD_DTL WHERE FIN_PRD_CD_CODE = #{finPrdCdCode} AND SLS_ORD_HD_NO = #{slsOrdHdNo}
INSERT INTO BF_SALES_OUT_DTL VALUES ('SLS_OUTD' || LPAD(BF_SALES_OUT_DTL_SEQ.nextval, 3, 0), (SELECT SLS_OUT_HD_NO FROM (SELECT SLS_OUT_HD_NO FROM BF_SALES_OUT_HD ORDER BY SLS_OUT_HD_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM=1), #{finPrdCdCode}, #{fnsPrdStkLotNo}, #{slsOutDtlPrvsVol}, #{slsOutDtlVol}, (SELECT FIN_PRD_CD_PRICE * #{slsOutDtlVol} FROM BF_CMN_FINISH_PRODUCT_CODE WHERE FIN_PRD_CD_CODE = #{finPrdCdCode}) )
mapper.select:
SELECT FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE, FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_NAME, OUTDTL.SLS_OUT_HD_NO, OUTDTL.FNS_PRD_STK_LOT_NO, OUTDTL.SLS_OUT_DTL_VOL, SUM(RTNDTL.SLS_RTN_DTL_VOL) AS SLS_RTN_DTL_VOL, FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_PRICE
FROM BF_SALES_OUT_DTL OUTDTL JOIN BF_CMN_FINISH_PRODUCT_CODE FNSPRD ON FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE = OUTDTL.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE JOIN BF_SALES_FINISH_PRODUCT_STOK FNSPRDSK ON FNSPRDSK.FNS_PRD_STK_LOT_NO = OUTDTL.FNS_PRD_STK_LOT_NO JOIN BF_SALES_RTN_DTL RTNDTL ON RTNDTL.FNS_PRD_STK_LOT_NO = OUTDTL.FNS_PRD_STK_LOT_NO
WHERE OUTDTL.SLS_OUT_HD_NO = #{slsOutHdNo}
GROUP BY FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE, FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_NAME, OUTDTL.SLS_OUT_HD_NO, OUTDTL.FNS_PRD_STK_LOT_NO, OUTDTL.SLS_OUT_DTL_VOL, FNSPRD.FIN_PRD_CD_PRICE
